<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fake Out](/Feats.aspx?ID=3161) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 112</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) For the purpose of gunslinger feats and abilities, if the ability states that you fire your weapon, you fire your weapon; if it does not state as such, you do not have to fire your weapon. Notably, Fake Out does not require you to actually fire your weapon._

**Trigger**
An ally is about to use an action that requires an attack roll, targeting a creature within your weapon's first range increment.

**Requirements**
You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

</column>

---

With a skilled flourish of your weapon, you force an enemy to acknowledge you as a threat. Make an attack roll to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) the triggering attack. If you dealt damage to that enemy with the same weapon since the start of your last turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to this roll.
name: Fake Out
requirement: You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.
requirement_markdown: You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.
